# Template Registry

The GPP Template Registry is a collection of community and official templates.

## Browsing Templates

### Command Line

```bash
# List all templates
gpp template list --registry

# Search templates
gpp template search dashboard

# Get template info
gpp template info @gpp/analytics-dashboard
```

### Online

Visit [gppkit.dev/templates](https://gppkit.dev/templates) to browse templates with previews and documentation.

## Installing from Registry

```bash
gpp template install @gpp/analytics-dashboard
```

Or specify a version:

```bash
gpp template install @gpp/analytics-dashboard@1.2.0
```

## Official Templates

Templates prefixed with `@gpp/` are officially maintained:

| Template | Platform | Description |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| @gpp/saas-starter | web | Complete SaaS starter |
| @gpp/api-prisma | api | FastAPI with Prisma |
| @gpp/mobile-auth | mobile | Mobile app with auth |

## Community Templates

Community templates use the author's namespace:

```bash
gpp template install @username/my-template
```

## Publishing Your Template

### 1. Prepare Your Template

Ensure your template has:
- Valid `variant.json`
- Complete `files/` directory
- README.md with usage instructions

### 2. Login to Registry

```bash
gpp registry login
```

### 3. Publish

```bash
gpp template publish ./my-template
```

### 4. Update

```bash
# Bump version in variant.json
gpp template publish ./my-template
```

## Version Management

Templates use semantic versioning:

```bash
# Install latest
gpp template install @username/template

# Install specific version
gpp template install @username/template@1.0.0

# Install version range
gpp template install @username/template@^1.0.0
```

## Private Templates

For team-internal templates:

```bash
# Set private registry
gpp config set registry https://registry.yourcompany.com

# Publish privately
gpp template publish ./my-template --private
```

## Template Quality

Official templates are reviewed for:
- Security best practices
- Code quality
- Documentation completeness
- Maintenance commitment

Community templates display:
- Download count
- Star rating
- Last updated date
- Verified author badge
